descriptionlist.description:
Tired of the boring (and tired) looking battery in your status bar? Looking to spice up your theme to stand out from the rest? Then you need...
is a themeable status bar battery replacement for iOS 7. Take control of your theme with a completely customizable new look. Choose from the 3 included themes (Bolus, Spots, and Habesha*) or design your own! The themeing engine within Alkaline is completely self-sustained and does not require Winterboard. Just select your theme from the list and go!
